Paragraph.Text: Creating a basic mining face is a lot of tedious, if done by hand. This machine will clear a 3 metre tall tunnel, in a 64m range. This model WILL clear ores, meaning you can use this for areas that need large machines built. Wide-open work spaces are conducive to organised bases! 4x faster than the MK2s!

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Range: Power Capacity: Power per block: Destroys Ores: Max. Power Recharge Rate:
